name: AppReview
author: podspod

sections.description: An iOS and MacOS app’s review can be written so easily! And the affiliate of LinkShare is also easy.
sections.installation:
1. Upload appreview directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
0.2.9

A result — a file — naming convention was changed. Bug fixed. – iOS’s category.

0.2.8

It corresponded to I18n and translated into Japanese.

0.2.7

Bug fixed. – The error of javascript was corrected.

0.2.6

Bug fixed. – The character code was corrected.

0.2.5

Bug fixed. – The error of javascript was corrected.

0.2.4

It corresponds to genre selection.

0.2.3

The ranking update button was abolished.

0.2.2

Some setting items were added. – iPad App, MacOS App e.t.c. – The region where AppStore corresponds was newestized.
Bug fixed. – The default preset value was added.

0.2.1

Add a screen shot. Modified the display version.

0.2

The first release at wordpress.org.
